Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. Given its unique features and benefits, we believe it's worth more than what others might be willing to pay. Considering its worth and the effort put into it, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $150. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the exclusive benefits and experiences it offers. I hope you find this offer compelling and look forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
